title: Q&A: Commission Solvency II head Wiedner on closing the deal on Omnibus II
description: Klaus Wiedner, head of the insurance and pensions unit at the European Commission, has the task of brokering a deal on Omnibus II. As negotiations go down to the wire, he rebuts criticism that too many concessions are being made to the insurance industry on the calibration of the package of measures for long-term guarantee products and lifts the veil on the safeguard clauses added to the text. Hugo Coelho asks him about the last hurdles
